mapper.select: SELECT r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_key FROM roles r JOIN user_roles ur ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT p.permission_id, p.permission_name, p.permission_key FROM permissions p JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT DISTINCT p.permission_id, p.permission_name, p.permission_key FROM permissions p JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id JOIN user_roles ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
